# Geospatial {#welcome .unnumbered}



* Banks have many offices. Locations mean the main office.
* Attempted to query all the addresses with geopy but estimated time would have been 16 hours of runtime.
* Instead we use the zip code coordiantes as proxy for the banks main offices.

Zip code data obtained from "ZIP Code Tabulation Areas" in
https://www.census.gov/geographies/reference-files/time-series/geo/gazetteer-files.html
